name: GreatDevelopers
overview: We are a product development company based in Delhi/Gaziabad, India, with extensive capabilities at conceptualizing, developing, enhancing and maintaining web applications/platforms, mobile applications and web based product. We have rich experience of having built social networks, Facebook applications, social games and iPhone applications and travel/trip planning sites and have a fast growing client base in US, Europe and India. We have a team consisting of people drawn from the best engineering schools in the country, and have built interesting and sophisticated projects for a range of clients including Top CAT coaching, QC web, Enrisk, Delhi film archive, Sports Store, Auction to Africa, The Lotto Stop. Within the brief span of 2 years of existence, Great developers has already served clients across the globe. Due to excellent reliability and quality of delivery at the right price point Great developers enjoys repeat customer ratio of more than 90%. Specialties social media, social and development networks development, social network applications, travel applications, web2.0 apps, iPhone applications, Enterprise systems.
